resources.string: Welcome to the Battery Saver Flashlight! There are numerous flashlight apps out there. This one gives you convenient options for conserving battery power. \n\nPLEASE NOTE: The Bluetooth and GPS status on the settings page do not update. Pressing the Back button (returns you to this page) and then clicking on the Continue button will update the displays. The next version of this app will address this bug.
Use the On/Off buttons below to enable/disable your WiFi, Bluetooth, and GPS services. (Back Button + Continue to update.)
Use the slider control below to adjust the brightness. Then click on the button containing your desired color to turn on the flashlight.
